channel.title: [PI]World Select Jpanel[PI]
channel.description: Hey guys, i wanted to make a custom world select option for my pi rsps. I wanted it to pop-up in a jframe then you select the world and it opens the client. Can anyone help me do this?

item.title: [PI]World Select Jpanel[PI]
item.dc:creator: @mrnessie mrnessie
item.description:
@mrnessie wrote:

Thanks, Ima test it out quickly.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]World Select Jpanel[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

you could draw an image to the client, and just add handling.

however, this code should be more than enough.actionPerformed(ActionEvent evt) { String cmd = evt.getActionCommand(); try { if (cmd != null) { if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("server")) { client.server = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(this, "Which address would you like to connect to?", "Set server address", QUESTION_MESSAGE)); } } } catch (Exception e) { System.out.println("Error thrown in Jframe.actionPerformed()"); e.printStackTrace(); } }this code is 100% untested, and may have problems/errors. you may fix them yourself.

Read full topic
